ygData.subject: Re: Self-adaptive Mutation Rates, Novelty Search and CMA-ES
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Vassilis, I think the fundamental reason why novelty search and self-adaptation play well together is that chasing novelty is a self-defeating struggle;
